Package org.daisy.streamline.api.identity

Provides an API for identifying file formats. This API enhances Files.probeContentType(java.nio.file.Path) in two ways:
  1. it supports OSGi runtime context in addition to SPI context
  2. it supports sub type identification (commonly used with e.g. XML)

Compatibility with FileTypeDetector

In an SPI environment, all implementations of FileTypeDetector will be available through this API. In an OSGi environment, the default implementation of FileTypeDetector will be available as well as any implementations provided by the package that is using this API.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Identifier
    Provides an interface for identifying a file format.
    IdentifierFactory
    Provides a factory for identifiers.
    IdentityProviderService
    Provides an interface for an IdentityProvider service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IdentityProvider
    Provides file identification based on its contents.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IdentificationFailedException
    Provides an exception for indicating that identification failed.
